sentences.sContent: a community in which people lived according to an ethos of sharing and caring
sentences.sCn: 人们本着分享与关爱精神来生活的社区

synos.tran: 民族精神；气质；社会思潮

remMethod.val: eth(=ethn民族， 种族) + os → 风貌

trans.tranCn: 气质, 道义, 民族精神, 社会思潮, 风气
trans.tranOther: the set of ideas and moral attitudes that are typical of a particular group
